Why did Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony come out today?

1. They had it on tape, so they could have done it earlier.

2. Was she was threatened? 

3. To force others to testify?

4. Something we don't know about?
subs.rawText:
Why did Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony come out today?

1. They had it on tape, so they could have done it earlier.

2. Was she was threatened? 

3. To force others to testify?

4. Something we don't know about?

subs.text: More questions. This happened 17 months ago. What was she doing all this time? What changed that made her want to speak now. Or maybe she spoke to the committee a long time ago? Why hold on to testimony like this? Why didn't the press get this story first?
subs.rawText: More questions. This happened 17 months ago. What was she doing all this time? What changed that made her want to speak now. Or maybe she spoke to the committee a long time ago? Why hold on to testimony like this? Why didn't the press get this story first?

subs.text: From what she says it sounds like at least a dozen people were inside on this, could have told basically the same story she told all these 17 months. That's a lot of potential sources the journalists could have gotten the story from.
subs.rawText: From what she says it sounds like at least a dozen people were inside on this, could have told basically the same story she told all these 17 months. That's a lot of potential sources the journalists could have gotten the story from.
